titles.title: My Heart Is Fixed, My Heart Is Fixed

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My heart is fixed, my heart is fixed,
I will sing to Thee and give Thee praise,
Thy loving kindness and faithfulness
Reaches to the heavens and to the clouds.
The Lord gives and the Lord takes away,
Blessed be the name of the Lord today,
My heart is fixed, my heart is fixed on Thee.
